messages.title: Fighting for local jobs and investment
messages.content: I want Newcastle North to be a place where everyone can find a good job at a fair wage, and where businesses are supported to start-up and grow.

messages.title: Standing up for our public services
messages.content: Seven years of Tory cuts have hit public services hard.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Support businesses to start-up and grow, create new jobs, and work closely with local firms to ensure they can compete globally.
Oppose cuts to public services, work towards delivering better and always stand up for properly-funded public services.
Protecting education funding from Tory cuts.
Striving for a fairer economy that works for everyone.

issues.economy: Striving for a fairer economy that works for everyone.
issues.education: Protecting education funding from Tory cuts.
issues.health: Standing up for our NHS and social care services.

leaflet.personalStatement: Since I was elected as your MP, I've always put the people, communities, and schools - sharing and problems of everyday Newcastle North life, listening carefully to your concerns and representing them robustly in Parliament.

politicalExperience.role: Member of Parliament for Newcastle North
politicalExperience.achievements: I have worked really hard to support the many thousands of local residents who have come to me for help, and I'm determined to continue fighting on your behalf.

contactInformation.address: The Lemington Centre, Tyne View, Lemington, Newcastle upon Tyne, NE15 8RZ

endorsements.endorsement: Catherine gets involved with so much locally, and clearly knows and really cares about our area.
Catherine has worked hard to give local people an effective voice in Parliament over the last seven years.
She works tirelessly to champion Newcastle North and our diverse city, and is always there to support local people.

images.caption: Delivering for Newcastle North leaflet images of candidate and constituents

leaflet.additionalNotes: I have already helped many people with a huge variety of issues - big and small - and I am always ready to try and resolve problems when constituents bring them to me.
